author: sussman
msg: * repos_admin.texi (Repository maintenance):  mention that one should
run db_recover before trying to use a backed-up repository.

author: brane
msg: Don't copy whole windows in the combiner, and maintain the count of
source copy ops within the window, so that the trivial_composition_p
field can be used instead. Add 'sview_len' and 'use_second'; change
of source copy instructions in the build baton's src_ops field.
(svn_txdelta__make_window): Copy src_ops from the baton to the window.
asserton that never gets triggered, even though the text is true ...
(svn_txdelta__compose_windows): Adjust for changes in the context struct,
and use window_B's src_ops field to detect trivial compositions.
These two changes are really only necessary because random-test
generates such windows. The undeltification code in libsvn_fs doesn't
backward-sliding windows if the source data won't be used (the source

author: philip
msg: --destination.  Add --nonrecursive to checkout. Add ? as an alias

author: kfogel
msg: Add 0.13.3 interim, move Alpha to Tuesday.
